md:
giải nghĩa từ "reminder" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Reminder** (noun)

* Meaning: a message or note that reminds someone of something they need to do or remember
* Type: noun
* Example sentence: "I set a reminder on my phone to pick up my sister from the airport."
* Related words: alarm, notification, alert, note, memo

**Reminder** (verb)

* Meaning: to remind someone of something they need to do or remember
* Type: verb
* Example sentence: "Can you remind me to call my mom tomorrow?"
* Related words: remind, notify, alert, inform, warn

Reminder (noun)

  • Example sentence: "I set a reminder on my phone to pick up my sister from the airport."
  • Related words: alarm, notification, alert, note, memo

Reminder (verb)
